title: BRIEF-Consolidated Zinc Enters Into Agreement to Acquire Remaining 10% Interest In Plomosas Mine
text:
BRIEF-Consolidated Zinc Enters Into Agreement to Acquire Remaining 10% Interest In Plomosas Mine

Commodities 1 hour ago (Sep 04, 2019 08:40)

BRIEF-Consolidated Zinc Enters Into Agreement to Acquire Remaining 10% Interest In Plomosas Mine Sept 4 (Reuters) - Consolidated Zinc Ltd : * ENTERED INTO A BINDING TERM SHEET ACQUIRE REMAINING 10% INTEREST IN 90% OWNED SUBSIDIARY THAT HOLDS PLOMOSAS MINE * CONSOLIDATED ZINC - DEAL FOR A 1% NET SMELTER RETURN ROYALTY FROM SALE OF ZINC AND LEAD CONCENTRATES PRODUCED FROM PLOMOSAS * ENTERED INTO A BINDING TERM SHEET AGREEMENT WITH RETEC GUARU S.A. DE C.V

BRIEF-Consolidated Zinc Enters Into Agreement to Acquire Remaining 10% Interest In Plomosas Mine
description: BRIEF-Consolidated Zinc Enters Into Agreement to Acquire Remaining 10% Interest In Plomosas Mine
